title: Netflix is expanding in Asia and plans to complete its 200-country takeover by 2016
content:
Netflix announced the next phase of its global rollout, with plans for expansion into four more Asian markets in early 2016.
Read the complete post at http://feeds.latimes.com/~r/newsandbuzz/~3/j0VWK34bcuc/la-et-ct-netflix-2016-expansion-taiwan-hong-kong-singapore-south-korea-20150908-story.htmlPublishedTue, Sep 8 2015 11:00 PMbyCOMPANY TOWN - Los Angeles Times
